title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: On linux, running build 20011127, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) also move down. This behavior may confuse users.
OB: When the view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) also move down.
EB: The pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) should stay in their original position when the view like the Navigator is resized smaller.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to a smaller size.
4. Observe the positions of the tool items, pulldown menu icon, and close icon.
